headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: campaign_ids
parameters.description: List of campaign IDs. Max size: 1.

parameters.name: material_type
parameters.description: Creative material type. Enum values: SPC_VIDEO , SPC_AD_TEXT , SPC_SPARK , SPC_CATALOG_VIDEO , SPC_CATALOG_CAROUSEL . If material_type is SPC_VIDEO , you can retrieve data on videos. You can specify basic data, video play, interaction, in-app event, in-app event (SKAN), page event, date, and video material details metric in the metrics field. If material_type is SPC_AD_TEXT , you can retrieve data on ad texts. You can only specify basic data, interaction, in-app event, in-app event (SKAN), page event, and date metrics in the metrics field. If material_type is SPC_SPARK , you can retrieve data on Spark Ad posts. You can only specify basic data, interaction, in-app event, in-app event (SKAN), and page event metrics in the metrics field. If material_type is SPC_CATALOG_VIDEO , you can retrieve data on catalog videos. You can only specify basic data, interaction, in-app event, in-app event (SKAN), page event and date metrics in the metrics field. If material_type is SPC_CATALOG_CAROUSEL , you can retrieve data on catalog carousel. You can only specify basic data, interaction, in-app event, in-app event (SKAN), page event and date metrics in the metrics field. To learn about the specific metrics within each metric type, see Metrics in Smart+ Campaign reports . Note : When material_type is set to SPC_SPARK , ensure the campaign_ids field only includes a campaign that contains Spark Ads exclusively. If any campaign specified within campaign_ids contains both Spark Ads and non-Spark Ads, an empty list will be returned. Smart+ Campaign reports of the SPC_CATALOG_VIDEO or SPC_CATALOG_CAROUSEL type are only supported for Smart+ Catalog Ads .

parameters.name: is_include_removed_material
parameters.description: Valid only when material_type is SPC_VIDEO , SPC_AD_TEXT , or SPC_SPARK . Whether to query data of deleted videos, texts, or posts. Supported values: true : Include data of deleted videos, texts, or posts in the response. false : Not include data of deleted videos, texts, or posts in the response. Default value: true .

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: Metrics to query. Default value: ["spend", "impressions"] . Refer to Metrics in Smart+ Campaign reports for all supported metrics for a report.

parameters.name: query_lifetime
parameters.description: Whether to request the lifetime metrics. Default value: false . If query_lifetime = true , the start_date and end_date parameters will be ignored.

parameters.name: start_date Conditional
parameters.description: Required when query_lifetime is false or not specified. Query start date (closed interval) in the format of YYYY-MM-DD . The date is based on the ad account time zone.

parameters.name: end_date Conditional
parameters.description: Required when query_lifetime is false or not specified. Query end date (closed interval) in the format of YYYY-MM-DD . The date is based on the ad account time zone. Note : The time difference between start_date and end_date must be less than 365 days.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value range: 1-100. Default value: 10.

examples.title: Run a report on ad texts
Run a report on Spark Ad posts
Run a report on catalog videos
Run a report on catalog carousel

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The unique ID of the request.

fields.name: list
fields.description: Data list.

fields.name: dimensions
fields.description: Dimension data.

fields.name: material_id
fields.description: Material ID.

fields.name: campaign_id
fields.description: Returned only when material_type is SPC_VIDEO , SPC_AD_TEXT , or SPC_SPARK . Campaign ID.

fields.name: catalog_id
fields.description: Returned only when material_type is SPC_CATALOG_VIDEO or SPC_CATALOG_CAROUSEL . Catalog ID.

fields.name: metrics
fields.description: Metric data. The following metrics will be returned alongside the metrics you specify via metrics in the request based on material_type : When material_type is SPC_VIDEO : is_removed_from_spc , video_id and file_name . When material_type is SPC_AD_TEXT : is_removed_from_spc , and ad_text . When material_type is SPC_SPARK : is_removed_from_spc , tiktok_item_id , identity_id and tiktok_name . When material_type is SPC_CATALOG_VIDEO or SPC_CATALOG_CAROUSEL : catalog_name , catalog_create_time , and catalog_modify_time .

fields.name: {metric_name}
fields.description: Returned metrics, which are determined by the metrics field specified in your request. Note : If your metrics include video_resolution , its data type is object.

fields.name: is_removed_from_spc
fields.description: Returned only when material_type is SPC_VIDEO , SPC_AD_TEXT , or SPC_SPARK . Whether the material is removed from the Smart+ ads. Enum values: "1" : true. "0" : false.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: Returned only when material_type is SPC_VIDEO . Video ID.

fields.name: file_name
fields.description: Returned only when material_type is SPC_VIDEO . Video name.

fields.name: ad_text
fields.description: Returned only when material_type is SPC_AD_TEXT . Ad text.

fields.name: identity_id
fields.description: Returned only when material_type is SPC_SPARK . Identity ID.

fields.name: tiktok_item_id
fields.description: Returned only when material_type is SPC_SPARK . The ID of the TikTok post to be used as an ad (Spark Ad).

fields.name: tiktok_name
fields.description: Returned only when material_type is SPC_SPARK . The username of the TikTok account. Note : Currently, Smart+ Campaigns support TikTok posts with identity_type as AUTH_CODE or TT_USER . For details about identities, see Identities .

fields.name: catalog_name
fields.description: Returned only when material_type is SPC_CATALOG_VIDEO or SPC_CATALOG_CAROUSEL . The name of the catalog.

fields.name: catalog_create_time
fields.description: Returned only when material_type is SPC_CATALOG_VIDEO or SPC_CATALOG_CAROUSEL . The time when the catalog was created, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0). Example: 2024-00-01 00:00:00 .

fields.name: catalog_modify_time
fields.description: Returned only when material_type is SPC_CATALOG_VIDEO or SPC_CATALOG_CAROUSEL . The time when the catalog was last modified, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0). Example: 2024-00-01 00:00:00 .

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: Pagination information.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Current page number.

fields.name: page_size
fields.description: Page size.

fields.name: total_number
fields.description: Total number of results.

fields.name: total_page
fields.description: Total pages of results.
